name: Coconut Water
history: Coconut Water has been a popular drink in tropical regions for centuries, where coconuts are native. It's known for its hydrating properties and has gained global popularity as a natural and refreshing beverage.
description: Coconut Water is the clear liquid found inside young green coconuts. It's naturally sweet, refreshing, and contains electrolytes, making it a popular choice for hydration and as a health drink.

instructions.title: Open the Coconut
instructions.description: Carefully open the top of the young green coconut using a coconut opener or a sharp tool.

instructions.title: Extract the Water
instructions.description: Insert a straw or pour the coconut water into a glass.

instructions.title: Serve
instructions.description: Enjoy the fresh coconut water as is. Optionally, it can be chilled before serving.

tips: Choose young green coconuts for sweeter water.
Be cautious when opening the coconut to avoid spillage.
variations: Add a splash of pineapple juice or lime for a flavored variation.
Mix with other fruit juices or smoothies for a tropical drink.

storage.shelfLife: Best consumed immediately. Store in the refrigerator for up to 24 hours if needed.
storage.instructions: Keep the coconut water in a sealed container if not consumed immediately.

presentationTips: Serve in a coconut shell for a natural and tropical presentation.
Garnish with a small umbrella or a slice of lime for a refreshing look.
